title: Estimate Tax for a Bonus
description: An employee is receiving a large bonus and wants to know how much they should have withheld for taxes to avoid a surprise bill.

tasks.description: Gather the employee's current year-to-date income and withholding information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all relevant paystub data.

tasks.description: Project the employee's total annual income, including the bonus.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately projects the total income for the year.

tasks.description: Calculate the total projected tax liability and recommend an additional withholding amount for the bonus payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a specific dollar amount to have withheld from the bonus.
